comments.body:
If you could add the license file for this repo and all of the other jaraco PRs, as in:

http://conda-forge.github.io/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

that would be great. I think all of them should be able to be merged after that.

My only issue with using this for the Jaraco files is that there's no actual license file here; it's only included in the metadata. I can take a vanilla copy of the MIT License and throw that in, but that doesn't seem like it's going to be accurate - there's at least a copyright field that needs to be filled out.
Ok, I just read through a long issue on this subject in the source repo. I'm going to merge without the license.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +36,40 @@about:
  home: https://github.com/jaraco/jaraco.logging
  # license_file: jaraco doesn't include license files - see https://github.com/jaraco/skeleton/issues/1
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
